pages.text: O-Foxes can be fully tamed with things like raw chicken, rabbit, cat, or sweet berries, beetroots, or glow berries. Wild O-Foxes generally only come in red, silver, and white. However, when bred, you have a small chance of breeding in a “domestic” color and/ or marking. Wild O-Foxes hunt chickens, rabbits, frogs and common cats.
